column3: woooo it's shady aka the army shady records break it down   i do a lotta spittin' and i don't gotta try but i ain't got rhymes to waste so let's make it i don't say i'm a gangsta i ain't be a sign these labels must be blind columbia i know this must be fucking with they mind they know they 'bout to cry cause they missed out but i know how to get the dough cause dre gave me a business
